channel.title: Release sword slayerdramon
channel.description:
[SIZE=4] What is in the package, 2h left and right Also drop/inv models, scim left and right also drop/inv models The scim and 2h are the same only a diffrent size[/SIZE] Hello,
As you see i am new to Moparscape i make models for fun If i want and like a request i do it. only thing i like is fantasy stuff with a picture as i am not good with drawing out of my head to bad :( And i wanted to release my Sword of Slayerdramomon of [Digimon] Its an old model so do not expect much from it, u can have it and do what ever u want to do with it, u may release on other websites but give me the credits as its my work. I will make more models later on and release some more old models first want to take a look arround and want to know your opinion, i did use this picture to make the frame:
[IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/germainemerks/swordslayer_zps33e9d6fb.png[/img] and This is the model: Download [url=http://uppit.com/ma4ee9ea0fg8/2h_and_normal_sword_also_left_side.rar]Download and.normal.sword.also.left.side.rar @ UppIT[/url] Pictures: [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/germainemerks/wireframe_zps5727a884.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/germainemerks/sword1_zps2e855573.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/germainemerks/sword2_zps4ba539c0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n497/germainemerks/sword3_zpseed39727.jpg[/img]
Original topic is at rune-server its my account before people think its not ask me on rune-server ^^ enjoy
